text: Ng Wing Biu (born 13 October 1944) is a Hong Kong fencer. He competed in three events at the 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Hong Kong male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Hong Kong Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Fencers at the 1978 Asian Games Category:Asian Games competitors for Hong Kong
title: Ng Wing Biu
